license.title: DM/SFG license agreement
license.description: Accept DM/SFG license after reading it. DM: https://ibm.biz/BdPzHS SFG: https://ibm.biz/BdPzHv

nameOverride.title: Name Override
nameOverride.description: This name will be appended to the release name to form the name of resources created by the chart.

fullnameOverride.title: Full Name Override
fullnameOverride.description: This name will be appended to the release name to form the name of resources created by the chart.

repository.title: DM/SFG image repository
repository.description: Docker registry to pull DM/SFG image from.

tag.title: Image tag
tag.description: A tag is a label applied to a image in a repository. Tags are how various images in a repository are distinguished from each other.

digest.title: Image digest
digest.description: A digest is a hash of a Docker image supported by the Docker v2 registry format.

pullPolicy.title: Image pull policy
pullPolicy.description: The default pull policy is IfNotPresent which causes the Kubelet to skip pulling an image if it already exists.

pullSecret.title: DM Image pull Secret
pullSecret.description: Secret used for pulling from private repositories.

name.title: Existing Service Account Name
name.description: If the user wishes to use own/already created service account, can specify the name here, default value is default.

enabled.title: Enable persistence storage for DM/SFG
enabled.description: Select this checkbox to store DM/SFG data on a persistent volume so that the data is preserved if the pod is stopped.

useDynamicProvisioning.title: Use dynamic provisioning
useDynamicProvisioning.description: Select this checkbox to allow the cluster to automatically provision new storage resource and create PersistentVolume objects.

preDefinedLogsPVCName.title: Name of the pre define persistent volume claim for logs
preDefinedLogsPVCName.description: By default a persistent volume claim for logs will be created with this name.

storageClassName.title: StorageClass Name
storageClassName.description: Choose a specific storage class name. Defaults to the default storage class in the cluster.

label.title: Label
label.description: Key label matching to specify app logs PVC .

value.title: Value
value.description: Key value matching to specify app logs PVC .

accessMode.title: Access Mode
accessMode.description: By default Access Mode is ReadWriteMany.

size.title: Size of the volume claim
size.description: Defaults to 500Mi of storage request. Choose a different size of disk if needed.

extraPVCs.title: Extra Volume
extraPVCs.description: User can use this property for extra persistent volume claim shared across all deployments.

supplementalGroups.title: Supplemental GID
supplementalGroups.description: Supplemental group id for persistent volume.

fsGroup.title: File System GID
fsGroup.description: File system group id for persistent volume.

runAsUser.title: Run as User
runAsUser.description: User id to use when running the deployment/containers.

runAsGroup.title: Run as Group
runAsGroup.description: Group id to use when running the deployment/containers.

logs.title: DM Logging
logs.description: Used to control the DM application and console logs.

enableAppLogOnConsole.title: App log on console
enableAppLogOnConsole.description: If true, redirects the application logs to the respective pod's console.

initialDelaySeconds.title: Initial delay in seconds
initialDelaySeconds.description: Initial delay in seconds for liveness probe.

timeoutSeconds.title: Timeout in seconds
timeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for liveness probe.

periodSeconds.title: Interval period in seconds
periodSeconds.description: Interval period in seconds for liveness probe.

initialDelaySeconds.title: Initial delay in seconds
initialDelaySeconds.description: Initial delay in seconds for readiness probe.

timeoutSeconds.title: Timeout in seconds
timeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for readiness probe.

periodSeconds.title: Interval period in seconds
periodSeconds.description: Interval period in seconds for readiness probe.

command.title: Command to be executed
command.description: Command to be executed for readiness probe.

externalGrpcPort.title: externalGrpcPort
externalGrpcPort.description: Specify kubernetes service port for gRPC

annotations.title: Annotations for this Ingress Resource
annotations.description: Specify annotations for this ingress resource with name and value for each annotation

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Specify annotations for this ingress resource with name and value for each annotation

topologySpreadConstraints.title: Topology spread constraints for pods
topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology spread constraints to control how Pods are spread across your cluster among failure-domains such as regions, zones, nodes, and other user-defined topology domains.

tolerations.title: Tolerations for pods
tolerations.description: Tolerations are applied to pods, and allow the pods to schedule onto nodes with matching taints.

cpu.title: CPU limit
cpu.description: The upper limit of CPU core. Specify integers, fractions (e.g. 0.5), or millicores values(e.g. 100m, where 100m is equivalent to .1 core).

memory.title: Memory limit
memory.description: The memory upper limit in bytes. Specify integers with suffixes: E, P, T, G, M, K, or power-of-two equivalents: Ei, Pi, Ti, Gi, Mi, Ki.

cpu.title: CPU request
cpu.description: The minimum required CPU core. Specify integers, fractions (e.g. 0.5), or millicore values(e.g. 100m, where 100m is equivalent to .1 core).

memory.title: Memory request
memory.description: The minimum memory in bytes. Specify integers with one of these suffixes: E, P, T, G, M, K, or power-of-two equivalents: Ei, Pi, Ti, Gi, Mi, Ki.

enabled.title: Enable Automatic Scaling
enabled.description: Specifies whether a horizontal pod autoscaler (HPA) is deployed. Note that enabling this field disables the Number of replicas field.

minReplicas.title: Minimum Number of Replicas
minReplicas.description: Lower limit for the number of pods that can be set by the autoscaler.

maxReplicas.title: Maximum Number of Replicas
maxReplicas.description: Upper limit for the number of pods that can be set by the autoscaler.  Cannot be lower than the minimum number of replicas.

targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.title: Target CPU Utilization Percentage
targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.description: Target average CPU utilization (represented as a percentage of requested CPU) over all the pods.

repository.title: Test docker image repository
repository.description: Docker image repository for test image

name.title: Test docker image name
name.description: Docker image name for test image.

digest.title: Image digest for test image
digest.description: A digest is a hash of a Docker image supported by the Docker v2 registry format.

pullPolicy.title: Image pull policy
pullPolicy.description: Image pull policy for the docker images.
